title: Feb 11: {N} Meeting - Maxâ€™s Paper and Hyperbolics

cells.data:
## Touch up on
- [ ] Bourgain's theorem
- [ ] Johnson Lindenstrauss

## Read:
- [ ] [Max's Paper](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1902.01738.pdf)
- [ ] [Poincare model for learning representations](https://arxiv.org/abs/1705.08039)

## Others:
Send free times to Prof Verma.

## Notes:

Metric space is more powerful than euclidean space. Review Bourgain's and JL theorems. They show the dimensionality of the embedding space needed to achieve lower than a certain distortion in the distances.

## Resources
[Explanation of the Poincare model for learning representations](http://bjlkeng.github.io/posts/hyperbolic-geometry-and-poincare-embeddings/)([Primer on Manifolds](http://bjlkeng.github.io/posts/manifolds/))
